name: B. V. D. Co., Appellant, v. Bondy
name_abbreviation: B. V. D. Co. v. Bondy

parties: B. V. D. Co., Appellant, v. Bondy.

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Kephart,
For the reasons assigned in B. V. D. Co. v. Kaufmann & Baer Co., supra, the1 order of the court below is reversed, the bill is reinstated, a procedendo awarded, costs to abide the determination of the case.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Kephart,

casebody.head_matter:
B. V. D. Co., Appellant, v. Bondy.
January 3, 1922:
